sentences.en: A fine start to the day, and my first sailfish on a fly.
sentences.cn: 这一天的开局真不错，这也是我第一次用飞杆钓到旗鱼。

sentences.en: And both have been pioneers of strict marine conservation practices, including catch-and-release only policies for sailfish and marlin.
sentences.cn: 两国还率先实行了极为严格的海洋资源保护措施，其中包括对捕获的旗鱼和青枪鱼必须放生。

sentences.en: The state offers a huge variety of fish, from largemouth bass to sailfish.
sentences.cn: 佛罗里达州出产非常多种鱼类, 从阔嘴黑鲈到旗鱼等不一而足.

trans.tran_en: any of several large scombroid game fishes of the genus Istiophorus, such as I
